column5: Hey folks, Today marks the beginning of poppy sales by our vets. Please be sure to support these great people by purchasing a poppy. They really do rely on this program to provide financial assistance to our vets. HH
Mine is displayed all 365 days my friend.
~~~Bought my first of many at the Ajax Go station I lose then regularly, And I don't mind buying another.
AMEN  I can only imagine what our veterans have lived throuth  Wear the poppy with pride. Cheers  Craig
